# BaseDataSection.GetBytes method

Returns the stored array from start with specified length.

```csharp
protected byte[] GetBytes(byte start, byte length)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| start | start byte |
| length | length |

## Return Value

The array value stored.
